title: Nick Perdomo, Pistols and Craft Beer
itunes:title: Nick Perdomo, Pistols and Craft Beer
description: On the heels of our Perdomo, Pistols and Pizza event in Nashua, New Hampshire we welcome into the studio Nick Perdomo where we discuss all things new from Perdomo Cigars...We will pair the new Perdomo Craft series with the appropriate beers and let you know how they change the game. All that and the usual insanity, on The Cigar Authority. ﻿
